body:
Thanks for your quick response.
I overwrite the third_party/protobuf by the last Release (v3.0.2) and I build it and it is Okay.
But when I try to run make on the grpc root folder I got the same Error (Reflection .....).

```
$HOME/grpc/third_party/protobuf$ ls -al ./src/.libs/
total 218720
drwxr-xr-x 2 user user      4096 Sep  8 10:59 .
drwxr-xr-x 6 user user      4096 Sep  8 10:59 ..
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user  56985816 Sep  8 10:56 libprotobuf.a
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        17 Sep  8 10:56 libprotobuf.la -> ../libprotobuf.la
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user       996 Sep  8 10:56 libprotobuf.lai
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user   4558296 Sep  8 10:59 libprotobuf-lite.a
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        22 Sep  8 10:59 libprotobuf-lite.la -> ../libprotobuf-lite.la
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user      1031 Sep  8 10:59 libprotobuf-lite.lai
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        26 Sep  8 10:59 libprotobuf-lite.so -> libprotobuf-lite.so.10.0.0
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        26 Sep  8 10:59 libprotobuf-lite.so.10 -> libprotobuf-lite.so.10.0.0
-rwxr-xr-x 1 user user   1990797 Sep  8 10:59 libprotobuf-lite.so.10.0.0
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        21 Sep  8 10:56 libprotobuf.so -> libprotobuf.so.10.0.0
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        21 Sep  8 10:56 libprotobuf.so.10 -> libprotobuf.so.10.0.0
-rwxr-xr-x 1 user user  22322560 Sep  8 10:56 libprotobuf.so.10.0.0
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user 104386548 Sep  8 10:59 libprotoc.a
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        15 Sep  8 10:59 libprotoc.la -> ../libprotoc.la
-rw-r--r-- 1 user user      1012 Sep  8 10:59 libprotoc.lai
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        19 Sep  8 10:59 libprotoc.so -> libprotoc.so.10.0.0
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user user        19 Sep  8 10:59 libprotoc.so.10 -> libprotoc.so.10.0.0
-rwxr-xr-x 1 user user  33408510 Sep  8 10:59 libprotoc.so.10.0.0
-rwxr-xr-x 1 user user    139788 Sep  8 10:59 lt-protoc
-rwxr-xr-x 1 user user    139788 Sep  8 10:59 protoc
```

When I call make From grpc root folder, I got the same Error (previous) :

```
[AR]      Creating $HOME/grpc//libs/opt/libgrpc++.a
[CXX]     Compiling src/cpp/ext/proto_server_reflection.cc
[CXX]     Compiling src/cpp/ext/proto_server_reflection_plugin.cc
[CXX]     Compiling src/cpp/ext/reflection.grpc.pb.cc
[CXX]     Compiling src/cpp/ext/## reflection.pb.cc
src/cpp/ext/reflection.pb.cc: In member function ‘google::protobuf::uint8* grpc::reflection::v1alpha::ServerReflectionRequest::InternalSerializeWithCachedSizesToArray(bool, google::protobuf::uint8*) const’:
src/cpp/ext/reflection.pb.cc:718:14: error: ‘InternalWriteMessageNoVirtualToArray’ is not a member of ‘google::protobuf::internal::WireFormatLite’
     target = ::google::protobuf::internal::WireFormatLite::
```

That mean I ca not generate  **libgrpc++_reflection** librairie.

Thx

Just a quick revisit - are you still encountering these issues? I would also suggest doing  a full "make clean" before building in case there are any targets left in an inconsistent state and for which the dependences are not proper.
